item.title: About

Iâ€™m Israel JesÃºs, Cloud Engineer at Nike, specialized in building scalable, secure, and cloud-native solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS). I currently work within Retail Technology environments, designing and operating cloud platforms that support large-scale, business-critical systems.

My experience spans cloud architecture, serverless and event-driven systems, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and MLOps practices.
